meanings.definition: An enzyme that cleaves nucleotides one at a time from the end of a polynucleotide chain.
meanings.sent1: The exonuclease carefully removed each nucleotide from the chain.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use exonuclease to study DNA sequences.
